content: Hi the Cargo feature issue template directs here or the rust internals forum... do devs/maintainers prefer a discussion here first, or just post a Pre-RFC post to the toos & infra group on internals.rust-lang.org?

The purpose of that suggestion is to avoid new issues appearing in the tracker that are essentially unanswerable feature requests that will remain open for the next decade before anyone gets around to them because having to close such issues can make people very angry, especially if the feature request wasn't formally rejected, but leaving them open is demoralizing.

@Mark V are you asking whether discussion on zulip is preferred over discussion on internals? I don't think there's a strict preference, though I wouldn't be surprised if the participation in each of those forums differs. If you have a lot of thoughts already worked out, then maybe the best thing would be to post a Pre-RFC to internals.rlo, and then link to it from Zulip for visibility?
